pages.text: 55|68|sekhane rayeche phalamula---khejura o anara.
55|69|Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
55|70|se udyanasamuhera majhe rayeche caritrabarti, anindya sundarigana [1].
55|71|Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
55|72|tara hura, tambute suraksita [1].
55|73|Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
55|74|ederake era age kono manusa athaba jina sparsa kareni.
55|75|Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
55|76|tara helana diye basabe sabuja takiyaya o sundara galicara upare [1].
55|77|Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
55|78|kata barakatamaya apanara rabera nama yini mahimamaya o mahanubhaba [1]
56|1|yakhana sanghatita habe kiyamata [1]
56|2|(takhana) etara sanghatana mithya balara ke'u thakabe na [1].
56|3|Eta ka'uke karabe nica, ka'uke karabe samunnata [1]
56|4|yakhana prabala kampane prakampita habe yamina
56|5|ebam curna-bicurna haye parabe parbatamala
56|6|atahpara ta paryabasita habe utksipta dhulikanaya
56|7|ara tomara bibhakta haye parabe tina dale --- [1]
56|8|atahpara dana dikera dala; dana dikera dalati kata saubhagyabana [1]
56|9|ebam bama dikera dala; ara bama dikera dalati kata hatabhaga [1]
56|10|ara agrabartigana'i to agrabarti [1]
56|11|tara'i naikatyapraapta
56|12|ni'amatapurna udyane
56|13|bahu sankhyaka habe purbabartidera madhya theke
56|14|ebam alpa sankhyaka habe parabartidera madhya theke [1].
56|15|Sbarna o dami pathara khacita asane
56|16|tara helana diye basabe, paraspara mukhomukhi haye [1].
